result.eng: Maybe you can play ping-pong (table tennis) in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain.

result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go mbeiḋ tú in ann leadóg ḃoird a imirt in Áras Ṁáirtín Uí ĊaḋainMaybe you can play ping-pong (table tennis) in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain.

result.eng: Maybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.orig: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.html: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go raiḃ a ḟios ag Bin Laden sular ṁaraiġ fórsaí speisialta Ṁeiriceá é gur aṫraiġ sé an doṁan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.

result.eng: In that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ga: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag

result.ponchtml: Sa ċoṁṫéacs sin b'ḟéidir nárḃ ḟiú an trioblóid le ḃeiṫ ag scríoḃ blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí

result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
